titleInfo.title: The [beta]-function and potential at [beta]=6.0 and 6.3 in Su(3) gauge theory

mods.abstract: Comparing optimized Wilson loop ratios on 16 4 and 8 4 lattices, matching predictions are obtained at [beta]=6.0 and 6.3. The static quark potential and string tension are also studied at these coupling constant values.
